name: chatbot-examples
description: Golden dataset for chatbot Q&A evaluation

examples.input: What is the capital of France?
examples.expectedOutput: The capital of France is Paris.

examples.input: How do I reset my password?
examples.expectedOutput: Go to Settings > Security > Reset Password and follow the prompts.
Our business hours are Monday through Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM EST.

examples.input: Can you help me track my order?
examples.expectedOutput: Please provide your order number and I can look up the tracking status for you.
Machine learning is a subset of artificial intelligence where systems learn patterns from data to make predictions or decisions without being explicitly programmed.
Why do programmers prefer dark mode? Because light attracts bugs!

examples.input: What payment methods do you accept?
examples.expectedOutput: We accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, PayPal, and Apple Pay.
